pull.title: ci: Set --nocleanup for Windows functional tests

committer MarcoFalke <falke.marco@gmail.com> 1632123701 +0200

ci: Set --nocleanup for Windows functional tests

This avoids intermittent issues in the CI Task when a test passes
successfully. For example:

PermissionError: [WinError 32] The process cannot access the file because it is being used by another process: 'C:\\Users\\ContainerAdministrator\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\test_runner_â‚¿_ðŸƒ_20210920_072037\\feature_versionbits_warning_89\\alert.txt'

events.message:
ci: Set --nocleanup for Windows functional tests

This avoids intermittent issues in the CI Task when a test passes
successfully. For example:

PermissionError: [WinError 32] The process cannot access the file because it is being used by another process: 'C:\\Users\\ContainerAdministrator\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\test_runner_â‚¿_ðŸƒ_20210920_072037\\feature_versionbits_warning_89\\alert.txt'

events.body: What is the time required to complete the task with both (qt and vcpkg) caches invalidated after reducing the memory usage?

> What is the time required to complete the task with both (qt and vcpkg) caches invalidated after reducing the memory usage?

I'd say there should be no effect, but I didn't test that. Removed commit for now.

issue.title: [DO NOT MERGE] ci: Test required resources for native Windows task
issue.body:
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/23043#issuecomment-923000258:
> What is the time required to complete the task with both (qt and vcpkg) caches invalidated after reducing the memory usage?

https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/23043#issuecomment-923004229:
> I'd say there should be no effect, but I didn't test that.

issue.title: ci: Reduce Windows memory for faster scheduling
issue.body:
A rebased https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/commit/fac3ae2333229109c4c65289fcdd6905d8f94467 from #23043.

The worst scenario (all caches are invalidated) tested in #23217.
